name: Aslan Zamani
story: Sadat Khusraw was born and raised in a small village in Iran. He joined the military at the age of 18, following in the footsteps of his father and older brothers. He excelled in his training, especially in medical procedures, and was quickly noticed by his superiors. After a short stint as a regular medic, he was transferred to a specialized reconnaissance unit, where his skills as a medic and his ability to navigate through rough terrain proved invaluable. Sadat is a dedicated soldier and takes pride in his work, but he also enjoys the camaraderie and adventure of military life. He hopes to one day become a doctor and return to his village to help his people.
